member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.ICacheDependencyHandler
member.summary: This interface is for the async outputCache providers to implement if they want to support Cache Dependencies

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.ICacheDependencyHandler.AddAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy)
member.summary: Async Add method that takes cacheItemPolicy as parameter

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.ICacheDependencyHandler.SetAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy)
member.summary: Async Set method that takes cacheItemPolicy as parameter

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.OutputCacheModuleAsync
member.summary: OutputCache Async Module, this Module is able to use Async type of OutputCache Providers

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.RemovedCallback
member.summary: This class convert System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback into format of System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedCallback

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.Cannot_get_snapshot_if_not_buffered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot get snapshot if not buffered..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.Cannot_use_snapshot_after_headers_sent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot use snapshot after headers sent..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.No_UniqueId_Cache_Dependency
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No UniqueId Cache Dependency.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.Provider_does_not_support_policy_for_responses
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Provider does not support policy for responses..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.Resource.SR.The_provided_IAsyncResult_is_invalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The provided {0} is invalid..

members.member: Assists in converting an method written using the Task Asynchronous Pattern to a Begin/End method pair

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.CryptoUtil.ComputeHash(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Computes the SHA256 hash of a given input.
member.param: The input over which to compute the hash.
member.returns: The binary hash (32 bytes) of the input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OutputCache.CryptoUtil.ComputeHash(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes the SHA256 hash of a given segment in a buffer.
member.param: The buffer over which to compute the hash.
The offset at which to begin computing the hash.
The number of bytes in the buffer to include in the hash.
member.returns: The binary hash (32 bytes) of the buffer segment.
